metadata.title: CVE-2019-19624 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds read was discovered in OpenCV before 4.1.1. Specifically,variable coarsest_scale is assumed to be greater than or equal tofinest_scale within the calc()/ocl_calc() functions in dis_flow.cpp.However, this is not true when dealing with small images, leading to anout-of-bounds read of the heap-allocated arrays Ux and Uy.

criterions.comment: opencv: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
